name: places/ChIJx40Yfr9YwokRAipeh3042ds
adrFormatAddress: 1452 2nd Ave, New York, NY 10021-3008, USA

editorialSummary.text: Laid-back Irish pub with 100-foot-long bar featuring karaoke, DJs & floor space for dancing.

originalText.text: Had the most amazing time celebrating my birthday here. Bartenders were great, drinks were excellent and the karaoke was a heck of a lot of fun! If you want to let your hair down a little and create fun times this def hits the spot!

text.text: Had the most amazing time celebrating my birthday here. Bartenders were great, drinks were excellent and the karaoke was a heck of a lot of fun! If you want to let your hair down a little and create fun times this def hits the spot!

originalText.text: Although Iggy's is a fun dive type. The bar, the bartenders, and the security are extremely nice. The crowd is quite fun. But it was tainted by the DJ who took kickbacks to put people in front of us for karaoke, which was the whole reason we chose to go there. We are from los angeles. We love karaoke. We arrived right at ten when karaoke began. We put in five songs between the 3 of us. We watched numerous peoples slip the DJ Brooke extra money and demand to be put in sooner than they should have, which she obliged depending on the tip. We watched several people do numerous songs before we were called for the first one at about one thirty Am. We then had to wait till three thirty AM for our follow-up songs. Watching the operation it put a damper on our visit, and we probably would not return on our next visit to New York. A basic example of indiscretion was simply that I was called before my daughter for my 2nd song. When I put my papers in a bit after her. So the way the d j rotates is not in proper order. We watched one young lady sing six songs throughout. Another young man sang three within the first hour and a half and was terribly drunk and demanding to go next each time. An older gentleman who came in well after we did got in 2 songs before we sang our first. So unless you have a spare $20 or $50 on you, be prepared to wait hours to sing.

An older gentleman who came in well after we did got in 2 songs before we sang our first. So unless you have a spare $20 or $50 on you, be prepared to wait hours to sing.

originalText.text:
I threw a private event here for my girlfriends birthday, and I have to say it was the most seamless, stress free experience I’ve ever had.

I worked with Ryan on planning the dates, times, and number of guests. The open bar price per person was so good, and it was 3 hours of open bar which is by far better than other bars in the city.

They even started the karaoke a little earlier for us which was extremely nice. The staff was attentive, and super helpful during the party.

They even have a local partnership with a pizza place which came at the exact time we asked, and they were only $15 a pie (can’t get better than that!)

All in all, the experience of planning, allowing us to decorate earlier, and bring cakes before hand made the planning for my event so straight forward.

I’ll definitely be coming back for football games during the season! Thank you all so much!!!

originalText.text:
It was a cool place but it seemed like the DJ doing karaoke was not experienced when I went and didn't display the song for people to see and would just announce it instead, wasting crazy time between people.

Overall it was good I just think it could be done better.

originalText.text: Been there alot over years always tremendous place great beer drinks etc today Leanna was the greatest bartender  awesome I'll be back there's nbdy better than her
